--- Clojure基础：

Forms

Reader macros

Functions

Buildings and namespaces

Flow control

Metadata

Clojue code is composed of Clojure data. Form Examples Primary Coverage Boolean true,false Character \a Keyword :tag,:doc List (1,2,3_),(println "foo") Map {:name "Bill", :age 42} Nil nil Number 1,4.2 Set #{:snap:crackle:pop} String "hello" Symbol user/foo,java.lang.String Vector [1 2 3]

Maps,Keywords and Structs

(def inventors {"Lisp" "McCarthy" "Clojure" "Hickey"}) (def inventors {"Lisp" "McCarthy", "Clojure" "Hickey"})

(inventors "Lisp") => "MacCarthy" (inventors "Foo") => nil
